mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into cron_job
`name`, project_id, job_type, job_status, cron_expression, start_date, end_date, `config`, description, create_by, create_time
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jobType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{config,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
